knitting:knit: Put enough twine in offhand, then hold interact to knit cloth
knitting:handbook-knit-twine-text: This material can be knitted into cloth using knitting needles.
knitting:handbook-knit-cloth-text: This material can be knitted from twine using knitting needles.
knitting:handbook-needles-text: This item can knit twine into cloth.
